DataElement.preferredName: ePRO Application Need Any Assistance Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of whether or not they needed assistance when using the Electronic Patient-reported Outcome (ePRO) Application.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Electronic Patient-reported Outcome System Need Any Assistance
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any of various systems designed to collect treatment outcome data directly from patients by electronic means._Anything that is necessary but lacking; the psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal; the reason for the action; that which gives purpose and direction to behavior._One, some, every, or all without specification._The act of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort.
